trans-unit.source: Configures properties for cookies used by a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 會設定 Web 應用程式所使用的 cookie 內容。

trans-unit.source: The HttpCookiesSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `httpCookies` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: HttpCookiesSection 類別可用來以程式設計方式存取和修改`httpCookies`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: It defines the settings applied by default to all cookies issued by the application, unless the code issuing the cookie overrides them.
trans-unit.target: 它會定義除非發行 cookie 的程式碼會覆寫它們，根據預設套用至應用程式時，所發出的所有 cookie 的設定。

trans-unit.source: One objective of the `httpCookies` element is to support the use of `HttpOnly` cookies.
trans-unit.target: 一個目標`httpCookies`項目是以支援使用`HttpOnly`cookie。

trans-unit.source: `HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting.
trans-unit.target: `HttpOnly`cookie (cookie`HttpOnly`屬性) 來協助降低風險的跨網站指令碼的 Internet Explorer 6 中所導入。

trans-unit.source: The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script.
trans-unit.target: `HttpOnly`屬性可防止 cookie 正由用戶端指令碼存取。

trans-unit.source: Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site.
trans-unit.target: 包含的任何資訊`HttpOnly`cookie 不太可能會透露給駭客或惡意的網站。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly."
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，搜尋 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) 中的"HttpOnly。 」

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HttpCookiesSection can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > HttpCookiesSection 可以讀取和寫入資訊的相關區段的區段屬性，<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其值為<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition></xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>根據組態檔

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookie domain name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 cookie 的網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The cookie domain name.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 的網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the support for the browser's <xref uid="langword_csharp_HttpOnly" name="HttpOnly" href=""></xref> cookie is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否支援的瀏覽器的<xref uid="langword_csharp_HttpOnly" name="HttpOnly" href=""></xref>已啟用 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The `httpCookies` element supports the use of `HttpOnly` cookies.
trans-unit.target: `httpCookies`項目支援使用`HttpOnly`cookie。

trans-unit.source: `HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting.
trans-unit.target: `HttpOnly`cookie (cookie`HttpOnly`屬性) 來協助降低風險的跨網站指令碼的 Internet Explorer 6 中所導入。

trans-unit.source: The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script.
trans-unit.target: `HttpOnly`屬性可防止 cookie 正由用戶端指令碼存取。

trans-unit.source: Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site.
trans-unit.target: 包含的任何資訊`HttpOnly`cookie 不太可能會透露給駭客或惡意的網站。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly."
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，搜尋 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) 中的"HttpOnly。 」

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if support for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HttpOnly" name="HttpOnly" href=""></xref> cookie is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果支援<xref uid="langword_csharp_HttpOnly" name="HttpOnly" href=""> </xref> cookie 會啟用，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) communication is required.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否需要安全通訊端層 (SSL) 通訊。

trans-unit.source: The RequireSSL property enables or disables output of the secure cookie attribute as described in RFC 2109.
trans-unit.target: RequireSSL 屬性啟用或停用安全 cookie 屬性 RFC 2109 中所述的輸出。

trans-unit.source: When used by compliant browsers, the cookie will only be sent back over a connection using SSL/TLS.
trans-unit.target: 由相容的瀏覽器時，才會傳回透過使用 SSL/TLS 連線傳送 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if SSL is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 SSL 已啟用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
